_sText:
skate_city_v3

SETTINGS:
sv_friction 0
sv_gravity 300
sv_airaccelerate 500

For extra giggles
sv_accelerate 500 (turn on for easymode)

Move by holding a strafe key (a or d) and turning the camera to turn. Jump and airstrafe for sharp turns (you lose speed if you try to turn quickly on the ground)
